channel.title: Everytime!
channel.description:
Everytime i dl a new client for the server that im making (Not for public release, or gonna be playable) the slots for the new items are messy, how do i fix them, because a skillcape comes up where i wield a weapon... i know this has something to do with my item.java or something but i would be glad if someone can tell me how to fix it =]
[i]Thanks[/i]

item.title: Everytime!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

You should have just asked me on MSN or PM.

Read full topic

item.title: Everytime!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Yeah, for every item you want, if it’s a Skillcape, put it’s ID in the Cape slot in item.java, if it’s a Shield put the ID in Shield slot, Etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Everytime!
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Yeah its ricscape, i got it now, public static int capes [] = { 6211…

Im deleting now anyway… its making my comp lag i think its got a virus…

Read full topic

item.title: Everytime!
item.dc:creator: @zezimaisme111 zezimaisme111
item.description:
@zezimaisme111 wrote:

eg:
if you wanted mining cape in the cape slot go in item.java and under player int capes { or something add 2722 to the list, then compile and save =D

thats ricscape… lol

Read full topic
